name: Praise Puff Adventures
description:
Praise Puff Adventures:

Praise Puff Adventures is a 2D pixel art platfomer inspired by the old Wisdom Tree Games bible games for the NES

How to play:

Find the 3 hidden switches to open the level exit before the timer runs out. Some enemies can be defeated by jumping on them, others cannot. You only have 3 lives and no continues. Use the arrow keys or the X-Box 360 D-Pad to move, spacebar or A button on X-Box 360 to Jump, Escape or B button on X-Box 360 to pause. Controls can be remapped from the Main Menu.

Unity Assets Used:
Platformer Pro (2D platformer engine)
2D Tilezone (2D tilemap painter)
Mega Handheld 8-bit Pixel Pack (level layouts level tilemaps & backgronds)
Mega 8-bit Pixel Pack (level layouts)
retro ACT sprite set (Player character & enemies)

Music Used:
Original Midis from - http://www.hymnsuntogod.org/
Converted with GXSCC into Chiptunes
